p: The model showed good correlation coefficients (R 2 = 0.97 and 0.96, respectively), good prediction values (Q 2 = 0.72 and 0.82, respectively), and high reproducibility (0.95 and 0.87, respectively) ( Figure 2). A plot of observed values versus predicted ones ( Figure 3) showed that the model can be used to correlate variables and responses.
